API name: Brighter Planet Climate Data REST API
Description: Brighter Planet fetches, corrects, and parses dozens of datasets daily to inform its emission calculation service. This data is presented for public use as a service to the community. Additional datasets are posted regularly. Brighter Planet delivers cloud-based web services providing on-demand carbon information for a fraction of a cent per query, meant for enhancing existing operational data with environmental intelligence that matters. The API uses RESTful or Taps protocol and responses are formatted in XML, JSON, CSV or SQL.
